name: byo
description: byo is like choo without a renderer

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/ && browserify index -p bundle-collapser/plugin > dist/bundle.js && browserify index -g unassertify -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin | uglifyjs > dist/bundle.min.js && zopfli -i 100 dist/bundle.min.js && wc -c < dist/bundle.min.js.gz | pretty-bytes

author: Jon Gacnik <jon@folderstudio.com>
